short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly look up Starshipit order information from the chrome side panel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this chrome extension to lookup Starshipit tracking information from any web page. Simply click the chrome extension icon in the top right, enter the order number, tracking number or search phrase, and get back from Starshipit the tracking information about that order.

Features:
- Open in Starshipit link
- Search across child accounts
- Customisable "copy text" for custom messages for your customers about the status of their order.
